name: illumination
description:
In the dense forest, with beautiful scenery, if you want to experience it firsthand, then join in! Use your wisdom and courage to embark on a thrilling outdoor trip! The melodious and soothing background music gives you a joyful mood while enjoying the scenery. The gameplay is simple, move the character around to check and pick up coins that will provide bonuses. Come and give it a try!

Gameplay

Move your character and pick up coins

Game features

The scenery is beautiful, and the terrain shaping also gives players a dazzling feeling

Players can freely explore all the scenery

No monsters bothering you
